# TalentLyt

> The #1 AI Interview Platform for High-Stakes Technical Hiring.

TalentLyt is a professional SaaS platform designed to conduct, evaluate, and verify technical interviews using Multi-Agent AI (Maya & Forensic Engine).

## Key Features
- **AI-Led Interviews**: Maya AI conducts adaptive technical conversations.
- **Forensic Integrity Verification**: Real-time detection of LLM assistance, proxy actors, and cheating.
- **Bias Reduction**: Standardized scoring based on technical truth, reducing human bias by 80%.
- **Enterprise Ready**: SOC2 compliant, scalable recruitment workflows, and deep technical assessments.

## Quick Links
- [About TalentLyt](https://talentlyt.cloud/about)
- [Pricing Plans](https://talentlyt.cloud/pricing)
- [AI Ethics & Integrity](https://talentlyt.cloud/ai-ethics)
- [Book a Live Demo](https://talentlyt.cloud/live-demo)
- [Contact Support](https://talentlyt.cloud/contact)

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 15+
- LiveKit (RTC)
- Multi-Agent AI System
- Forensic-grade behavioral auditing.
